Function Documentation

NITF_BOOL nitf_SegmentWriter_attachSource ( nitf_SegmentWriter *  writer,
nitf_SegmentSource *  segmentSource,
nitf_Error *  error 
)

Attach the given segmentSource to this Writer The Writer obtains ownership of the passed segmentSource, and will destruct it when the Writer is destructed.
